Others: The Dallas Mavericks ended their five-game losing streak with a 118-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers.
Quinten Grimes scored 26 points, nine rebounds, and six assists for the Mavericks.
P.J. Washington shot 9 for 14 and finished with 22 points and eight rebounds for the Mavs.
The Mavericks' reserves outscored the Lakers bench 50-25, including 38 combined points from Grimes and Jaden Hardy.
Anthony Davis led the Lakers with 21 points and 12 rebounds.
LeBron James added 18 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists for the Lakers.
The Lakers lost their second straight and for the third time in five games.
